data.name: PathCapType
desc: These constants determine which shape to use for start or end of a stroked path.
The start and end of stroked paths can have one out of several different shapes (which are, of course, only visible for strokes wider than one device pixel).

items.name: BUTT
lines: End the path at its start or end point, without any cap.

items.name: ROUND
lines: Extend the path with a half circle cap, diameter is the line width.

items.name: SQUARE
lines: Extend the path with a rectangular cap, half the line width long.
